name: Elessar
headline: AI-powered engineering productivity tools
description: Elessar boosts engineering productivity by integrating with your existing ecosystem of tools to automatically generate changelogs, streamline communications, and provide AI-powered reporting to engineers & managers.
markdown:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/6461b88c2bd50f8f9ecbab29_1_DDZhsdw54DiXt90T5OvxAA.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/643fbfd8dcc8510ed721e263_whiter-back.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64379ecb5438ff28fd19a9db_noise%20\(1\).png)
Product
# The ultimate engineering visibility AI assistant and platform
Seamlessly integrated with your existing ecosystem by connecting codebases, communications, and documentation tools all together. Install to your org with a few clicks and immediately upgrade team productivity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/6438b1a8afdca56c73bf725f_25231.png)
AI generated pull request changelogs
Elessar uses AI to generate standardized changelogs per pull request — saving time and capturing everything.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/643fbf562c981ead66f92b3e_Notion.png)
Notion documentation and weekly reports
Elessar automatically documents in Notion so that codebase progress is easily accessible to everyone.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/6437b1000485b34884a7efdc_slack_logo.png)
The only Slack bot you need
Elessar creates a temporary channel per PR with two-way sync, statuses, and AI summaries — improving speed and visibility.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64e31668fa9c4928efbd6942_vscode.png)
Doc search and changelogs right in your editor
Elessar's VS Code extension makes it easy to search & understand changes without having to sift through diffs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/643fe2d55b52561dd086d1fa_linear.png)
Integrated issue tracking
Issues, tasks, and metrics from Linear are automatically linked to Elessar channels and integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64925c0ddac5954a7535caa6_email_logo.png)
Personalized daily email digests
Elessar sends daily digests to engineers and managers synthesizing important updates in one place.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/643fe26b5aeef87424f373bf_noun-security-1514739.png)
Private and Secure
All data is protected by the highest security standards and is encrypted at both transit and rest. Data processed by OpenAI is not used to train or improve OpenAI’s model. Learn more about [OpenAI's data usage policy](https://www.getelessar.com/<https:/openai.com/policies/api-data-usage-policies>).
## Engineers love Elessar and Orgs run infinitely better.
Say goodbye to frustrating back-and-forth, tedious documentation, and missed contributions. With Elessar, everyone can see more, do more, and succeed more.
[Get Started Now](https://www.getelessar.com/<https:/app.getelessar.com>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64379ecb5438ff4f1919a939_White%20Tick.svg)
1-month free trial
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64379ecb5438ff4f1919a939_White%20Tick.svg)
Easy onboarding
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64379ecb5438ff4f1919a939_White%20Tick.svg)
Secure
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64e3300c806b2a29c38eab4a_eng-love-right.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/64379ecb5438ff054f19a99b_Feature%20Card%20BG%20Big%20.webp)

Contact sales
FAQ
#### What tools does Elessar integrate with?
Elessar currently integrates with GitHub, Notion, Linear, Slack, and Email. Integrations with GitLab, Confluence, JIRA, and more are coming soon!
#### What level of access does Elessar have to my company’s codebase?
Elessar only has access to pull requests and issues — it does not have access to your actual codebase. Additionally, PR diffs are processed through an encrypted pipeline and are never stored.
#### How does Elessar keep my company's data private and secure?
Elessar is exclusively built on SOC II compliant policies and infrastructures (GCP) with extensive enterprise-grade security measures. Our partnership with OpenAI and their APIs ensures that processing is solely inference based (your data is not used for training nor stored). For a full walkthrough of our security practices, feel free to reach out via support@getelessar.com.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64379ecb5438ff8aa219a8fc/6437a2ef3566667dd572091b_elessar-new-logo.png)](https://www.getelessar.com/</>)

generated_description:
**Elessar: Revolutionizing Engineering Productivity with AI**

Founded in 2022, Elessar is a budding startup nestled in Palo Alto and is a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S22. At its core, Elessar is dedicated to enhancing engineering productivity through AI-powered tools. The vision? To seamlessly integrate with existing systems and empower engineering teams by automating tasks that are often time-consuming and cumbersome.

### Why Elessar?

Elessar’s suite of features focuses on three key areas:
- **Automated Changelogs**: With its AI capabilities, Elessar generates standardized changelogs for pull requests, ensuring every contribution is well-documented and easy to track.
- **Streamlined Communication**: The platform improves interactions among team members by creating dedicated Slack channels for each pull request that syncs statuses and provides AI summaries.
- **Intuitive Documentation**: It automatically populates documentation in tools like Notion, keeping progress transparent and accessible.

This company isn’t just creating tools; it's building a comprehensive ecosystem where everything from codebases to communications and documentation can be managed effortlessly.

### Features You’ll Love

1. **AI-Generated Pull Request Changelogs**: Automatically created for efficiency.
2. **Notion Integration**: Keeps documentation up-to-date without manual effort.
3. **Slack Bot**: Manage pull requests with ease through dedicated channels.
4. **VS Code Extension**: Enables quick access to changelogs and documentation right in the code editor.
5. **Daily Digest Emails**: Customized summaries sent straight to engineers and managers.

### Pricing Model

Elessar is accessible, with a Pro plan priced at just $7 per month per user, and an option for enterprises that require more robust, self-hosted solutions.

### Security Focused

Elessar takes security seriously. It employs top-notch encryption protocols and strictly adheres to SOC II compliance for your peace of mind, ensuring your data remains safe.

### In Summary

Elessar is capturing the spirit of modern engineering practices by leveraging AI to minimize the hassle of managing documentation and promoting clearer communication. For teams that aim to maximize efficiency and visibility in their workflows, Elessar might just be the game-changer you need. 

Curious to learn more? Check them out at their website: [Elessar](https://www.getelessar.com/).

With a small team of just two, their ambition is taking shape rapidly. You might want to keep an eye on this promising startup in the ever-competitive tech landscape.
